description:
Experienced and proven, Basch & Keegan, LLP is committed to helping you through difficult times. Our Latham, New York, law firm focuses exclusively on negligence cases such as car accidents, animal attacks, birth injuries, medical malpractice and bad faith insurance. We have put millions of dollars back in the hands of people who have suffered the unthinkable. Our goal is to put you on the best possible path to recovery.

Our law firm stands above others for a number of reasons, including the following:

  • We have handled more than 10,000 personal injury cases.
  • Our attorneys have more than 100 years of combined experience.
  • We are exceptional litigators and highly skilled negotiators.

The legal professionals at our practice have earned a number of honors for their commitment to clients and proven results. For example, they hold an Avvo "Superb" rating and have been listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100. More importantly, the people we work with walk away from our practice feeling supported and confident. We consistently return significant verdicts and settlements to our clients so they can pay medical bills, account for lost wages and start moving forward.

Basch & Keegan, LLP offers free initial consultations. Our law firm also has the ability to accommodate clients' convenience by meeting with them at one of our three locations as per preference, or through virtual appointments.
